original_text: To each of them he gave new clothing, but to Benjamin he gave three hundred shekels of silver and five sets of clothes.
korean_text: 또 그들에게 다 각기 옷 한 벌씩을 주되 베냐민에게는 은 삼백과 옷 다섯 벌을 주고

sentences.original_text: To each of them he gave new clothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각각에게 그는 새 옷을 주었다

sentences.original_text: but to Benjamin he gave three hundred shekels of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 베냐민에게는 그가 삼백 세겔의 은을 주었다
